title: The new anti-AI trade sweeping Wall Street: 'HALO'
description: Investors are bidding up companies with hefty real assets such as grids, pipelines and heavy machinery that are least likely to be replaced by artificial intelligence.
content: Suddenly, what's old is new again. There's a popular trade sweeping Wall Street that's offering an old world solution to the threat of AI disruption: "HALO," or "Heavy Assets, Low Obsolescence." What that means is that more investors are betting that... [3691 chars]

title: Anthropic faces deadline on deal for Pentagon to use AI model
description: Anthropic faces a 5 p.m. EST deadline to comply with the Pentagon and allow it to use the company's artificial intelligence system without restraint.
content:
Feb. 27 (UPI) -- Anthropic faces a 5 p.m. EST deadline to comply with the Pentagon and allow it to use the company's artificial intelligence system without restraint.
If Anthropic declines, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth has said he will have the ... [2947 chars]

title: Pentagon Standoff Is a Decisive Moment for How A.I. Will Be Used in War
description: The Pentagon’s contract dispute with Anthropic is part of a wider clash about the use of artificial intelligence for national security and who decides on any safeguards.
content:
The fight between the Department of Defense and the artificial intelligence company Anthropic has ostensibly been about a $200 million contract over the use of A.I. in classified systems.
But as the two sides careen toward a 5:01 p.m. Friday deadline... [1292 chars]

title: Sribhumi man accused of using AI to make morphed video, held
description: Silchar: A 28-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly creating and circulating a fake obscene video of a woman using artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Jack Dorsey’s Block slashes nearly half its staff in AI bet
description: Jack Dorsey's Block is cutting 4,000 employees, reducing its workforce by nearly half, in a move the financial technology firm is describing as a bet on artificial intelligence changing the future of labor productivity.
content:

title: Ohio recognized for using AI to improve programs for Jobs and Family Services clients
description: Ohio's Department of Jobs and Family Services launched four tools that use artificial intelligence in the last year, including a multilingual virtual assistant that serves residents in 15 languages.
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio — The Ohio Department of Job and Family Services received a national award for incorporating use of artificial intelligence to improve handling state unemployment services.

title: Jack Dorsey cuts nearly half of Block workforce amid major AI overhaul
description: Block layoffs affect over 4,000 jobs as CEO Jack Dorsey cuts nearly half the workforce to integrate artificial intelligence throughout the payments company's operations.
content:
Block on Thursday announced that it will cut nearly half of its workforce as the payments firm works to embed artificial intelligence (AI) throughout its operations.
The layoffs will affect over 4,000 jobs at the company and CEO Jack Dorsey indicated... [2366 chars]

title: Financial Shares Walloped by AI, Credit Woes (KKR, KEY) Hit Three
description: Heightened anxiety about the threat from artificial intelligence and suddenly shaky bets on private credit delivered another bruising selloff in shares of banks and asset managers.
content:
